data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick Bielefeld.
In the minute 4, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 6, Bielefeld's Marcel Hartel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Benjamin Brand awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Bielefeld.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Bielefeld's Nathan De Medina has been booked in Frankfurt.
The match at Commerzbank Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sebastian Rode, who is down injured.
In the minute 9, Frankfurt's Dominik Kohr breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Sebastian Rode is back on the pitch.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Bielefeld.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Commerzbank Arena.
Benjamin Brand waits before resuming play because Nathan De Medina for Bielefeld is still down.
In the minute 14, Nathan De Medina, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Cedric Brunner is the substitute for Bielefeld.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 17, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Bas Dost (Frankfurt) strikes at Commerzbank Arena but his header is cleared.
David Abraham for Frankfurt gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
In the minute 21, Frankfurt's Sebastian Rode gets in a shot on goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, In Frankfurt Frankfurt attack through Danny Da Costa. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
In the minute 24, Throw-in high up the field for Bielefeld in Frankfurt.
In Frankfurt Bielefeld attack through Manuel Prietl. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 26, Important block from the Bielefeld defence as Dominik Kohr fires in a strike for Frankfurt.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Commerzbank Arena.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Amos Pieper (Bielefeld) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Frankfurt defenders.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 31, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Andre Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Frankfurt.
In the minute 32, Andre Silva of Frankfurt smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bas Dost (Frankfurt) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 34, Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Manuel Prietl for Bielefeld drives towards goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Benjamin Brand signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Benjamin Brand awards the away team a throw-in.
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Sergio Cordova (Bielefeld) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Anderson Lucoqui for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Frankfurt.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half is over at Commerzbank Arena.
Benjamin Brand has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Bielefeld advance rapidly upfield but Benjamin Brand blows for offside.
Aymen Barkok is replacing Dominik Kohr for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Danny Da Costa with Steven Zuber. This is the second substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
Can Frankfurt capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 48, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Aymen Barkok for Frankfurt drives towards goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ritsu Doan of Bielefeld gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 50, Benjamin Brand awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
Bielefeld take a 0-1 lead thanks to Cebio Soukou.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Bielefeld's Amos Pieper breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 56, Aymen Barkok is booked for the home team.
Frankfurt's Daichi Kamada gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bielefeld defender.
Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Frankfurt push upfield but Benjamin Brand quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
Andre Silva is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 63, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Anderson Lucoqui.
Andre Silva is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Andre Silva for Frankfurt is back on the field again.
In the minute 65, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Bielefeld's Anderson Lucoqui is back in action after a slight knock.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Bielefeld at Commerzbank Arena.
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cedric Brunner (Bielefeld) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Frankfurt are coming forward and Daichi Kamada gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Anderson Lucoqui (Bielefeld) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jacob Laursen.
In the minute 73, Uwe Neuhaus (Bielefeld) is making a fourth substitution, with Christian Gebauer replacing Ritsu Doan.
Uwe Neuhaus is making the team's third substitution at Commerzbank Arena with Fabian Kunze replacing Cebio Soukou.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 75, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
Benjamin Brand signals a throw-in for Bielefeld, close to Frankfurt's area.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a third substitution, with Stefan Ilsanker replacing Sebastian Rode.
In the minute 77, Frankfurt have a goal kick.
